section.heading: Waiver or reduction of fees for the use of school facilities.

annotations.annotation: Section 7066(b) of D.C. Act 23-404 amended section 4 of D.C. Law 22-196 and provided that the creation of this section by § 4 of D.C. Law 22-210 is subject to the includsion of the law' fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore, the creation of this section by section 2 of Law 22-210 has not been implemented.
